meanings.definition: A sleeveless dress worn by girls for physical education classes.
meanings.sent1: During gym class, Sarah wore a gymslip to stay cool.
meanings.sent2: The girls lined up in their gymslips before starting the exercise.
meanings.sent3: The gymslip looked like a colorful parachute as the girls twirled around.
meanings.sent4: Her gymslip fluttered in the wind like a flag of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The bright red gymslip stood out among the sea of uniforms.

meanings.sent1: She will gymslip for the first time tomorrow at school.
meanings.sent2: Every Friday, the students gymslip for their PE lesson.
meanings.sent3: He decided to gymslip to impress his crush during the sports event.
meanings.sent4: The dancers gymslipped gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The model confidently gymslipped down the runway.

meanings.definition: A gymslip is a type of clothing.
meanings.sent1: In the store, the gymslip was displayed next to the school uniforms.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite gymslip had a floral pattern and lace trim.
meanings.sent3: The gymslip was so comfy, she wore it even outside of gym class.
meanings.sent4: The gymslip became her go-to outfit for casual weekends.
meanings.sent5: The vintage gymslip had a timeless charm that caught everyone's eye.
